name: Dawn Town
description:
Use your tiny cute fruits army to survive as long as you can! Keep the invaders away from your town, upgrade your minion and plan the strategy to let them admire another dawn!

Gather resources and spend them wisely! Every day, some enemies can spawn outside the walls, don't let them destroy the gate, or the mill and the villagers will be threatened.

KEY Functionality Camera Mouse L Select Orbit Mouse R Disable Task (Shortcut) / Mouse Wheel Force task execution (Shortcut) Pitch Mouse Scroll / Zoom + -

_____________________________________________________________________

This is my first game ever released, I hope you find it fun to play :)
